trans-unit.source: Allows coordination of initialization for a component and its dependent properties.

You should implement this interface when your component has initialization dependencies on other components that also implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface.
trans-unit.target: 當您的元件具有也實作其他元件的初始化相依性時，您應該實作這個介面<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification>介面。

trans-unit.source: You can check to see if the dependent components have completed initialization by checking the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查相依元件是否已檢查完成初始化<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> is implemented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl> types.
Occurs when initialization of the component is completed.

This event typically occurs during the call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method for the component, but it may occur later if the component has dependent controls that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification> interface and the dependent controls have not completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: 此事件通常就會發生的呼叫期間<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A>方法的元件，但是它可能會發生稍後如果元件有相依的控制項實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification>介面和相依的控制項尚未完成初始化。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component is initialized.
<see langword="true" /> to indicate the component has completed initialization; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示元件已完成初始化，否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A> property is automatically set to `false` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A> method is called, and `true` when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitializeNotification.IsInitialized%2A>屬性會自動設定為`false`時<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit%2A>呼叫方法時，和`true`時<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit%2A>方法呼叫。
